column5: Well, I had full intentions of buying a new boat this year until my neighbour/fishing partner decided on a beautiful 18.5 Lund. So instead, when I'm not fishing, I will spend a good portion of my summer on two wheels.
Nice scooter! Nice backrest for your neighbour/fishing partner too!
Lol Brian does that mean I can trade my boat in for a bike?  Oh yeah nice scooter
It'll have to be one of these if we're going to both fit on it!
Nice ride !!! Where do the rod holders go?
